The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

我估计是mapbox是三维的，而scatterGL只是二维的散点图，所以无法支持，只能考虑使用scatter3D，但是貌似效果也不太好，那些symbol在三维下呈现不好。
Thanks @dawiwt
demo is [here](https://ende93.github.io/echarts/test/geo-map.html), see console and hover map can see the effect
@100pah  For number like string, I treat it just as string not number, so its dimType will be 'ordinal', otherwise number like sting's dimType is 'float', and that will cause this bug.

> @dengzengjian 你应该这么设置
> ` { value: 0, name: "", label: { show: false }, labelLine: { show: false }, }`
> 文档中的配置项itemStyle没有normal
> https://www.echartsjs.com/option.html#series-pie.data.itemStyle

谢谢,解决了.这个4.0 以后的版本跟3版本是不一样的,按你说的,把itemStyle和normal两层去掉就行了
能不能吸附到线上后，y轴只选中与tooltips关联的点呢？

> 饼图数据就不该有负数，负数想表达什么意义呢？期望什么效果呢？
我们在做24小时数据均值变化得时候  发现变化有正有负 采用的饼图
传入数据的时候，map 一下你的数据，把负数变为 0
好的

请确保使用的不是 rc 版本，而是正式版本。如需进一步帮助，请在 https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html 复现。

This is a bug when no data is selected in the visible area, but `areaStyle` should still be applied, which in this case is the background color under data lines.
We should improve our clipping ability so that the area can be rendered and clipped. 
Related to #10010 .
Categories are served as IDs and should be unique.

请提供一个可复现的例子 https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html
连续刷新是指多次 setOption 吗？
部分苹果机有特定的型号吗？
Can you provide a demo with minimum data?
@Ovilia Yes, that's what I thought, and I think in production no one will use same categories.
do you solved this question?

改成了svg渲染ok了 ，暂时可以了
myChart = echarts.init(document.getElementById("echarts"),null,{renderer:'svg'})
相同的问题，希望提供一个示例

I've removed lots of data and some more settings, so that the issue still occurs: https://jsfiddle.net/tmtron/brndo1hf/72/

I noticed something that may be helpful:
* the time of the first data-point in `datasetSource1` is before `xAxis.min`
* when we update this first datapoint to be `=> xAxis.min` the issue also does not occur
```
1554139666196 time of first value
1554139674662 xAxis min value 
```

> 请提供一个可复现的例子 https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html
> 连续刷新是指多次 setOption 吗？
> 部分苹果机有特定的型号吗？

刷新只一次setOption，没有多次。
苹果7plus、iphoneX上出现，其他机型未测。我觉得很多人都出现了这个问题哦。
有时会报错“null is not object（l.save）“

Why don't you just remove the listener on map `myChart.on("click", "series.map", function (e) {`?
请问怎么解决的
I want clicking both map and scatter would highlight the province. if I remove click event on map, when clicking on map, it would not highlight the province.

> What is the data background do you mean?

e.g. in this [example](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-examples/public/editor.html?c=area-simple) (I've highlighted) the data-background in the zoomslider (the small red line):
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20422904/55777993-f2b9ad00-5aa1-11e9-827e-24861796652b.png)
This does not work for custom series.

> What's the related code?

Not sure what your mean: there is not really any code for this - when you activate the [zoom slider](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#dataZoom-slider.type)  in the options, 

```
    option = {
        dataZoom: [{
            type: 'slider',
            },
        ...
```
you automatically see the data-background (there are however some [styling options](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#dataZoom-slider.dataBackground))

> Please check http://echarts.apache.org/option.html#toolbox.feature for custom toolbox features.

Thanks for the answer! But i want to call a toolbox feature from a button outside echarts (whit the echartInstance), not create a custom feature.

`myChart.dispatchAction( type: 'dataView' } `
